name: Adventure Dribble
description:
Let's overcome all obstacles and score your epic goal!

Swipe to move the player.
Don’t forget to dribble the ball towards the goal area.
Try to avoid all kinds of obstacles on the way, including your rival team players.

If you lose the ball to an opponent, get hit by a bomb, or fall off the pitch… you’ll have to start over again.

Now conquer every field and become a legendary dribbler!
Have fun!
